name: (not) Voxels
description:
This is a game that I made by following Leo Svanå's tutorial. However it didn't work for me so I had to make my own system based on Leo's code, and this is the result. There are actually no voxels in this game, just a lot of cubes that become "moveable" when hit. I'm planning on developing this project further, so subscribe to my youtube and itch.io

yes, I just copy-pasted everything from the game
